document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2014-03
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING CHAPTER 12.04 TITLED "PARK AND RECREATION AREA USE REGULATIONS" ADDING SECTIONS 12.04.230 TOBACCO USE IN CITY PARKS AND SECTION 12.040.231 TOBACCO USE IN CITY PARKS - ENFORCEMENT
